ingredients: 3 -5 anchovy fillets or use 2-4 teaspoons anchovy paste
3 -5 anchovy fillets or use 2-4 teaspoons anchovy paste
¼ to ½ tsp. chili pepper flakes
1 28oz.can San Marzano crushed tomatoes (or whatever tomatoes you have)
½ cup pitted Kalamata olives, halved (or use your favorite olives)
½ cup pitted green olives, halved
